general_health.name: How You Fit Treat Yeast Infection For Home
general_health.content:
a. Yogurt: Put tampon for inside yogurt and put am for toto. You fit do am two times every day  until the infection go. 
 b. Garlic: Comot the skin of garlic and put am inside your toto, leave am gor reach overnight. Do am everynight until the infection don go. E dey help cure yeast infection for home. 
 c.  Tea tree oil: Tea tree oil dey help cure signs of krokro and body seratching wey yeast infection de cause. Pour small oil of tea tree for tampon and put am inside toto.

general_health.name: How U Fit Prevent Vaginal Infection (Toilet Disease)
general_health.content:
a. Dey keep yourself clean and dry every time. 
 b. No dey use toto sprays or soap wey get big big perfume for toto. 
 c. Make sure say germs from bombom no enter your toto at you de clean am. 
 d. No dey wear tight clothes wey no dey allow heat comot for body for example nylon underwear, tight jeans and partyhose wey no get cotton. 
 e. if you want have sex, use condom e dey prevent disease wey fit come from sex. 
 f. Dey eat yoghurt well well. 
 g. No use pads wey get perfume. 
 h. No use or wear dirty clothes. 
 i. Go check  up every year.

general_health.name: The Causes of Krokro After Bathing, Prevention Cure.
general_health.content: Krokro na dey way the body the tell us say e no like wetin dey for am. E dey natural to comot anything wey fit damage body. E fit be water, temperature touch body and toilet papers.

general_health.name: Those Things Wey Fit Cause Krokro After Bathing
general_health.content:
a. Water: Water fit scratch body if remain for long time if remain for longtime after bathing. Bathing for long fit cause am or the person no dry body completely whom he bath finish. 
 b. Temperature: If na tempturature dey cause am, dey  the doctor wey sabi fit check am. Water used for bathing fit scratch body or fit burn the skin or cause pain and for body. If na big krokro, e fit damage the skin.  Abeg no use hot water e go worse the situation. 
 c. Toiletries: Toiletries like toothpaste, soap and shampoo fit scratch body if e touch am. If you dey brush while bathing. E fit touch other part of the bodi and cause krokro. If you no commot am, e go scratch your body. 
 d. Srubbing: if you dey use hard sponge scrub body while bathing, e fit cause krokro. 
 e. Hypersensivity: If you get skin wey dey reject many many thingd, if yiu scrub am or  use bad water touch am, e fit cause krokro. 
 f. Infections: many many small small germs wey dey live inside water fit cause krokro while the person dey bath.

general_health.name: How You Fit Prevent Krokro For Skin
general_health.content:
a. Use mild soap and shampoo: Dey use normal soap or pikin soap. No dey use antiseptic soap. Make sure say you commot all the soap and shampoo wey you take bath body. Dry your body quick quick after bathing. 
 b. Use warm water to bath for short time: No dey bath long time with hot water. 
 c. Scrub the body small small when you dey bath, no dey scrub the body hard while bathing. Remember, all dead cells go commot by themselves. 
 d. Dry the skin well well after bathing: Make sure say you use dry towel to clean your body after bathing. Allow breeze to dry your body before you go wear clothe. 
 e. Rob pomade for dry skin after bathing: Make sure your skin dry well well before you rub cream. No dey use pomade wey get scent if your bodi dey reject many many things.

general_health.name: How You Fit Stop Skin Scratching
general_health.content:
a. Always bath with clean water for short time: Use your hands to rub your body. No dey use hard sponge or other rough rough object to scrub the skin. Dry your skin well well after bath. 
 b. Use air dry well well: if you get electric fan, or air conditioner, use am to cool down before you go wear clothes. No use fan or air conditioner if the weather dey cool. 
 c. Rub petroleum jelly (vaseline) on the afftected area: No use cream wey get water  until scratching go.

general_health.name: Wetin Be High Blood Pressure
general_health.content: High blood pressure or hypertension na when a person blood pressure go higher than 140/90min Hg. This condition na serious one for woman wey get belle. High blood pressure no dey always serious for pregnant woman, but e fit cause dangerous health problem for mama and her pikin. According to people wey dey study about disease control and prevention, they talk say na plenty woman wey carry belle for America get high blood pressure.

general_health.name: Wetin Dey Cause Heart Attacks?
general_health.content:
Heart attack dey start when blood no dey enter heart again. Big big fats fit block the road wey dey enter heart. When blood no dey enter heart, e fit damage, destroy many many heart muscle.The things wey fit cause heart attack are: 
  a.  Smoking. 
 b.  High cholesterol level. 
 c. Diabetes. 
 d. Stress. 
 e. High blood pressure. 
 f.  Too much fat inactive lifestyle. 
 g.  Eating plenty fruits and vegetable.

general_health.name: Wetin Be Birth Asphyxia?
general_health.content:
Asphyxia na lack of oxygen for body. Birth asphyxia dey start when pikin brain and other body organs no fit get enough oxygrn before, during or after birth. No body fit know say this kind thing dey happen. If oxygen no dey cells no fit work wekk. Dirty products (acids) fit say for cells and damage am.The level of damage wey this birth asphyxia fit cause depends on: 
 a. How long the body no get plenty air and oxygen. 
 b. How low the oxygen dey. 
 c. How quick they run give am treatment.

general_health.name: Symptoms For Birth Asphyxia
general_health.content:
Symptoms for bith asphyxia for the time of birth na: 
 a. No breathing or breathing dey weak. 
 b. Skin color dey blue, gray or lighter than normal. 
 c. Low heart rate. 
 d. Poor muscle tone. 
 e. Weak reflexes. 
 f. Acid dey too much for blood. 
 g. Birth water don mix with shit. 
 h. E get seizures.

general_health.name: How You Fit Treat Asphyxia
general_health.content:
If your pikin get small asphyxia for birth, doctor fit put machine for am wey go help am breathe and he go remove am when the pikin fit breathe on him own. 
 a. Breathing machine. 
 b. Respiratory therapy. 
 c. Fluid/water. 
 d. Medicine wey go prevent seizure. 
 e. Doctor go use intravenous method to give the pikin food.

general_health.name: Wetin Be HIV/AIDS?
general_health.content:
HIV na Human Immunedeficiency Virus na germs wey dey kill all the things wey dey help the body fight disease. HIV dey weak the body go reach the extent that the person go de sick sick every time. The higher level for HIV Infection na (AIDS) Aquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome. E fit take from 2 to 15 years for person wey carry HIV to develop to AIDS. A person wey carry AIDS fit get some career, infection plus other bad health problems. The symptoms of HIV dey depend on the level if infection. The first signs for the infection na fever, headache, bad throat and krokro. Sometimes, the person no fit show any sign. But as the infection dey continue, the person fit dey show signs like diarrhea, weight loss, and cough. If e no treat  quick quick, he or she fit get Tuberculosis, meningitis, bad bacteria infections and cancer. A person wey carry HIV/AIDS fit give am another person wey no carry am through infected body fluid, blood, breast milk, sperm, vaginal secretions, using one sharp object and body transplant. A person no fit carry HIV/AIDS through ordinary daily kissing, hugging, hand shaking, sharing food, clothes and water. If you want to prevent HIV/AIDS: 
 a. No dey share sharp object with anybody. 
 b. No have sex with another person other than your patner. Dey faithful to your partner. Use condom if you want to have sex. Make unna go for HIV/AIDS test or check up.

general_health.name: Wetin Be Cancer?
general_health.content: Cancer na abnormal growth for body. E dey grow fast reach other body organs. Cancer na the general name for this disease, and e fit affect any part of the body. You fit carry am for lung, breast, skin, stomach and prostrate. The things wey fit cause cancer na roofing sheet, tobacco smoke, smoke from wood and charcoal, infections from germs, bleaching cream, some chemicals and old age.

general_health.name: Wetin Be Cholera?
general_health.content: Cholera na serious diarrhea infection wey fit get by eating and drinking food and water wey disease or germs don touch. A person wey get cholera go dey shit water water shit. The water water sheet dey start from 12 hours to 5 days after the person don eat food or drink water wey germs don touch. Cholera fit kill person quick quick if you no treat am urgently.For prevention of cholera make sure say you cover your food and water so that flies and germs no fit touch am, wash your hands always when you shit or touch pickin shit, make sure say you wash your hands before you chop and keep your surroundings clean.

general_health.name: Wetin Be Ebola?
general_health.content: Ebola na disease wey wirus dey cause. When a person get ebola, the sign dey start to show from 2 reach 21 days after e don carry am. The first signs for ebola disease na quick fever, tiredness, muscle pain, headache, bad throat etc. other signs na vomiting, shit shit, krokro, kidney problem and liver wahala. The person fit also get inside and outside bleeding say blood dey comot from gum and shit. A person fit get Ebola disease if him touch blood, organs and bloody fluids of other animals wey don carry am already like monkey, chimpanzees, antilope, gorillas, fruit bats, sick or dead porcupines for forest. Also, person fit carry ebola for him touch dead animal or man pikin wey ebola don kill. This one also fit spread Ebola.

sex.name: Sickness from Sex (STD).
sex.content:
Sickness from sex  (STDs) na de sickness wey person dey catch from another person from sex , de sicknes dey different and dem plenty pass 20 wey dey. 
 a. Chlamydia. 
 b. Germital herpes. 
 c. Gonorrhea. 
 d. HIV/AIDS. 
 e. HPV. 
 f. Syphilis. 
 g. Trichomoniasis. 
 Many sickness from sex (STDs）dey enter woman plus man join put but the egbe e dey cos plenty for woman side pass and if woman get belle e dey affect the pikins too.  Atibiotics fit kill de sickness wey na bacteria ,yeast or miswaka insects (parasite) dey cos but no kill dey for afect wey na virus dey cos oo ,but melecin fit helep untop make person nor feel am much plus to put pause untop am.

sibiling.name: Some pikin skin wahala:
sibiling.content:
Wetin de cause am and symptoms. Na germs, allergies, heat and wet nappy dey cause pikin skin wahala. Most skin wahala no dey stay long. Common pikin skin wahala na: 
 a. Heat rash: another name for heat rash na prickly heat. Na sweat wey no dry and remain for skin dey cause am. E dey small, red and get pointed bumps. E dey common for countries wey get plenty hot and rain weather plenty sweat for hot weather, high fever, wearing pikin thick cloth, wearing pikin cloth wey allow sweat to comot and rubbing pikin creams wey block chance wey sweat dey take comot for body dey cause heat rash. 
 b. The nappy rash: nappy rash dey common for pikin wey dey 2-12 months old. This one dey be like red rash wey dey for areas for body wey nappy de cover. Na peece, shit, dirty nappy, wet nappy and infections from germs de cause am. If you tie pikin fabric, e fit cause am too. 
 c. Cradle cap: this one na pink or red patches for scalp. Sometimes e dey affect the armpit and neck, and na white flakes or yellow scales fit cover am. Na bacteria infection, bad oil production for oil gland and hair follicles de cause am. 
 d. Eczema: them be rashes of red , itching, rough and dry skin. E fit dey for chick and legs of pikin and children and adult fit get am. We no know wetin de cause eczema, but many factor fit dey contribute. Them be high temperature, viral infection, dust for house, insect, detergent wey body no want, soaps and pomade.

sibiling.name: How you fit treat, prevent pikin skin wahala:
sibiling.content:
wear your pikin light cloth depending on weather, no wear pikin thick nappy for hot weather. No use strong soap for body especially antiseptic pikin soap and no dye pikin cloth. Make you reduce the time wey you dey use bath pikin for 5 minutes go reach 10 minutes. Make you use light cream like Vaseline rub pikin body. 
 a.  Treatment for heat rash: no use thick nappy. Make you keep room cool. Wear pikin light cloth. No use thick body pomade. Make use pomade wey dey cure heat rash rub pikin. 
 b. Treatment for nappy rash: make you change baby nappy always. Make you use cool water wash pikin yash when you change  diaper and rub Vaseline for him bomb om. Use cream wey doctor talk for this kind treatment. 
 c. Treatment for cradle cap: make you put olive oil for pikin head for one hour before you go bath am. E go make the krokro soft before you bath am. Make you use medicated champoo bath pikin head. Use pomade wey doctor talk say go cure cradle cap. 
 d. Treatment for eczema: bath pikin with warm water and mild soap. No rub pikin any pomade when you dey dry him body. Leave am make e dry. Make you rub body pomade every day for prevention of eczema. Use pomade wey doctor talk.

sibiling.name: Wetin dey cause fever and high temperature for pikin them?
sibiling.content: The temperature wey dey normal for pikin na 36.5oc – 38oc. Fever don come when pikin body temperature dey high pass 38oc. Fever no be sickness but na sign say sickness don come. Fever na natural way wey the body dey fight diseases. Many many things fit cause fever for pikin and the fever fit stay for small time. Sometime, fever fit stay longer for body and sign say serious sickness don come. Na infection na the main thing wey dey cause fever for pikin them.

sibiling.name: Symptoms of fever:
sibiling.content: For every day, body  temperature dey go up and down. E fit dey high for afternoon and evening and e fit dey lower for morning. Fever fit come slow slow and go up quick quick or group within few days.

sibiling.name: Wetin dey cause fever?
sibiling.content:
a. Virus: virus dey cause infection like cold, upper respiratory tract infection, and chicken pox. 
 Bacteria: bacteria dey cause infection like ear and throat infection, meningitis, urinary tract infection, pneumonia, sore throat and blood infections. 
 Allergic reactions: e fit be reactions to drugs, vaccines, pollens, and other air pollutants de cause am.

sibiling.name: When you fit see doctor for your pikin fever and high temperature?
sibiling.content:
a. If pikin wey dey 3 months or less get fever, run  go meet doctor quick quick because you no fit know whether na serious sickness dey cause the fever or not. 
 b. If pikin wey dey 3- 12 months get fever run go meet doctor quick quick because serious sickness fit dey cause the fever. 
 c. If pikin wey don pass 12 months old get fever. Run quick go meet doctor if you see this signs: 
 1. Difficult for breathing. 
 2. Drowsiness. 
 3. Vomiting wey no stop or shit shit. 
 4. Serious headache, neck dey stiff and light dey peper pikin for eyes. 
 5. Pikin dey more sick than before, dey thin, de weak and restless. 
 6. No dey drink water and no dey peece like before. 
 7. Body dey pain am. 
 8. No fit get well after 48 hours. 
 9. If many many other things dey worry you.

sibiling.name: How you fit treat fever
sibiling.content:
Make you give the pikin plenty water so that water no go finish for him body. If the pikin no dey drink water, a beg tell doctor.  Do these things so that pikin go recover. 
 a. Wear the pikin light cloths. 
 b. No use fan. 
 c. Give the pikin plenty breastmilk. 
 d. If the pikin don dey chop other foods, give am normal food small small. 
 e. If the pikin don old pass 6 months continue dey give am breast milk and other food. Give am water make e drink. 
 f. Give am paracetamol and other medicine as doctor take tell you. No give am over dose because e fit damage liver.

spouse.name: Wetin dey caused lack of ejaculation
spouse.content: lack of ejaculation dey start when the man sperm dey enter bladder instead of tip of penis. Wetin dey cause am na diabetes, injury for the spine, operation for prostrate, urethra, and bladder.

spouse.name: Wetin be erection wahala?
spouse.content: Erection wahala na when man penis no fit stand strong and long for him to have sex. Na impotence dey cause am . e fit start for any age, but e dey common for old men and people wey get health wahala. Sometimes, man pikin fit get small erection wahala, but e dey normal.

spouse.name: Wetin dey cause erection wahala?
spouse.content:
Many things dey cause erection wahala, dem be: 
 a. Drinking plenty alcohol and smoking. 
 b. Other health wahala, like diabetes, high blood pressure, over thinking and depression. 
 c. Stress. 
 d. Side effects of some medicine. 
 e. Physical wahala, like injury for nerves or blood no run go reach penis. 
 f. Operations way include prostate cancer operation.

spouse.name: Wetin be the symptoms
spouse.content: The only symptom na when man no fit get an erection and e no fit keep him penis long for him to have sex. Any man wey get this kind wahala go still dey feel sex, get or reach orgasm and fit ejaculate.

spouse.name: How you go check or test erection wahala?
spouse.content: The doctor go ask the man plenty question about him health and him go do test for am. The doctor go ask am how many times the wahala dey happen. Then, the doctor go do lab test for am and fit test him brain. All the test go help the doctor know wetin dey cause the erection wahala.

spouse.name: How you fit treat erection wahala?
spouse.content:
Many things dey involve for this kind treatment. The treatment go include:- 
 a. You go avoid tobacco, drugs and reduce alcohol wey you dey drink. 
 b. You go know and stop drinking all the medicines wey dey cause this wahala. 
 c. You talk about this wahala with your wife.
 d. You go do exercise and take advice. 
 e. You fit do operation for penis and drink medicine.

spouse.name: Can my belle affect my partner’s interest for sex?
spouse.content: True, your pregnancy fit touch him interest for sex. Pregnancy fit make you look fine and good to him and him go feel to get sex with you. E fit be true say your pregnancy dey worry am and him fit dey think about the load wey him go carry as papa. This one fit make no go need sex. Make una talk wetin dey worry both of una, e go help una relax and enjoy one another as papa and mama.
